price: Na wale walio amini na wakatenda mema, hao ndio watu wa Peponi, humo watadumu.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Na wale walio amini na wakatenda mema hao ndio watu wa Peponi, kwa sababu wao wameamini na wakatimiza iliyo wajibisha Imani yao, nayo ni vitendo vyema, basi wao watakaa Peponi daima milele.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
